issue.title: [CI] [Python] Error: Cannot store empty datasets
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12977](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12977). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
the test test_update_dataset_from_ddf_empty is failing at https://github.com/ursacomputing/crossbow/runs/2743631263#step:7:4088, which is an error in the compute() function

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12977?focusedCommentId=17357550) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Could you please note which crossbow job this is?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12977?focusedCommentId=17358607) by Joris Van den Bossche (jorisvandenbossche):*
It would indeed be good if you can add some more context to those issues, like the name of the build (eg at least mention this is the kartothek build). 

I now noticed through your email to the builds mailing list that you created this issue, but I was just searching for "kartothek" and didn't find any relevant JIRA, so I opened ARROW-12988. Will close this one, as the other now has more information.
